message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $10000 to you. Considering the significant worth and quality of this product, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to purchase it now, you can enjoy it at a special introductory price of $9500. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this exceptional deal.
